# 6D063-215471(2) - Janitorial Services RFP

## Tender Detail

* Reference Number: WS3457947400- Doc3723519024
* Amendment Number: 5
* Solicitation Number: WS3457947400
* Publication Date: October 25, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: December 7, 2022 (14:00:00)
* Amendment Date: November 30, 2022
* Expected Contract Start Date: N/A
* Expected Contract End Date: November 30, 2025
* Tender Status: Expired
* UNSPSC: Janitorial equipment, wet or dry combination vacuum cleaners, cleaning and janitorial supplies, floor cleaners, general purpose cleaners, toilet cleaners, cleaning and janitorial services
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of Delivery: Manitoba, Canada

## Contracting Entity

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

## Contact Information

* Onwuama Ezechinedu, Nkechi (SPAC/PSPC) - nkechi.onwuamaezechinedu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Description

The Public Health Agency of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide janitorial services for its buildings, including daily cleaning, weekly, monthly, quarterly, semi-annual, and annual tasks. The services are required to maintain a clean and healthy environment for research and development activities. The successful contractor will be responsible for providing cleaning equipment and supplies, and will be expected to attend a site visit at 1015 Arlington Street, Winnipeg, MB R3E 3M4 on November 8, 2022.

## Important Note

It is mandatory that the bidder or a representative visit the work site and confirm attendance with the contracting authority by November 3, 2022. Failure to attend the site visit or send a representative may result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
